The Swordmaiden was one of the colossal Walking Statues of Waterdeep and its remains could be found in the North Ward of Waterdeep.
This statue resembled a female version of the Honorable Knight walking statue.
By 1492 DR, the statues head was a shop known as Thorts Findings, located in a city square between Hassantyrs Street, Tarsars Street, Whaelgond Way, and Ussilbran Street.
During theÂ Spellplague, in the , the walking statue appeared and rampaged through the city. When stopped, the residents of Waterdeeps North Ward dismantled it and used its pieces for construction.
